name: react-electron-template
description: The Complete Electron, React Template for Robust Multi-Platform Apps in Production

scripts.build:debug: npm run clean:build && npm run debug && electron-builder build
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && concurrently "npm run build:main" "npm run build:renderer"
scripts.debug: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_ENV=debug webpack --config configs/webpack.main.prod.ts" "cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_ENV=debug webpack --config configs/webpack.renderer.prod.ts"
scripts.make:linux: npm run clean:build && npm run build && electron-builder build -l
scripts.make:mac: npm run clean:build && npm run build && electron-builder build -m
scripts.make:win: npm run clean:build && npm run build && electron-builder build -w
scripts.prod:debug: npm run clean:dist && npm run debug && cd app && npm start
scripts.prod: npm run build && cd app && npm start
scripts.start:preload: npm run clean:dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELECTRON_ENV=debug webpack --config configs/webpack.preload.dev.ts
scripts.start:renderer: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELECTRON_ENV=debug webpack serve --config configs/webpack.renderer.dev.ts
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node configs/check-port.ts && concurrently "npm run start:preload" "npm run start:renderer"
